Title: Galakrond's Unrest
Description:
Galakrond's Rest. Where the Dark Heart was first empowered by Iridikron. We don't know what power the relic holds, but we do know that the Harbinger now wields it.

And now one of our Riftwalkers is missing, right where it all began.

I don't believe this is a coincidence, $n. Let's travel to Northrend and search the area.
ObjectivesText: Meet Alleria at Galakrond's Rest in Dragonblight.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Alleria at Galakrond's Rest in Dragonblight.

Objectives.Text: Take Rift from Telogrus Rift to Northrend
